meanings.definition: A portable computer that can be easily carried and used in various locations.
meanings.sent1: My sister bought a new laptops for her college classes.
meanings.sent2: I always take my laptops with me when I travel.
meanings.sent3: The laptops decided to take a break and refused to turn on during the important presentation.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a laptops, storing information and processing tasks efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The laptops hummed softly as it processed the complex calculations.

meanings.definition: The act of using a laptop computer.
meanings.sent1: His laptops is filled with stickers from different places he has visited.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys the laptops in the park on sunny days.
meanings.sent3: The laptops seemed to have a mind of its own, typing random letters on the screen.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced across the laptops keyboard, typing out the report quickly.
meanings.sent5: The laptops glowed in the dimly lit room, illuminating her face as she worked.
